download.title: Download haex-vault
download.subtitle: Secure, encrypted storage for all your data. Available for desktop and mobile.

nightlyWarning.title: Experimental Build
nightlyWarning.description: Nightly builds are automated and may contain bugs or incomplete features. Use at your own risk.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: Your data is encrypted locally before syncing. Only you have the keys.

sync.title: Seamless Sync
sync.description: Access your data from any device. Changes sync instantly across all platforms.

offline.title: Offline First
offline.description: Works without internet. Your data is always available, even offline.
